Name: Our Beautiful Earth
About the game: Forests, deserts, small towns, seashores, there are many beautiful places on our planet. They are all gifts from nature to mankind. If you can't travel to these places in person, then please enter our game and start a relaxing and enjoyable experience. 30 beautiful scenes puzzle game between every scene casual mode or challenge mode all kinds of animals local customs around the world
